mapper.insert: insert into member(username, email, password, role) values(#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{role});
insert into music(roomid, artist, title, musicFileBytes) values(#{roomId}, #{artist}, #{title}, #{musicFileBytes});

mapper.delete: delete from music where roomid = #{roomId} and title ilike #{title} and artist ilike #{artist};
